RelatedSentence: The 10 billion Yuan fund will support infrastructure projects under the umbrella of the silk road plan .

The state media reported the project will prioritize building ports and infrastructure in strategically important littoral countries in Southeast Asia and the Indian Ocean region , including Bangladesh and Sri Lanka .
